segments.text: Yes . I would like a ticket to Pakistan on CA .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is that a one-way or round trip ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When would you want to leave ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to leave on Nov . 2nd and return on Nov . 21st .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sorry . The flight on Nov . 21st is full.Do you mind if I put your name on the waiting list ?
segments.speaker: S1
